column4: speaking of -dev packages.. is there a way to always get headers etc. installed with a package?
grr... it's freaking annoying that the ubuntu packaged fglrx drivers are so out-dated
seems like this version is for xorg 6.8.0 and is the fglrx drive version 8.8.25
lets do a math test... which is the higher number, 8 or 10?
lets look at the site instead shall we?
the current version has a bug so you can't use Xv together with tv-out
that's a month - considering ati's promise to release new linux drivers every second month I'd consider that to be outdated
